controller

Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Class for handling communication with a Client.
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Jan-Jaap van Raffe and Wouter Bos

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String clientname
      The name of the client this handler handles with.
      private GameHandler game
      GameHandler for handling a game.
      private java.io.PrintStream out
      The output of this handler.
      private java.lang.Thread peer
      Peer thread for all incoming messages from the Client.
      private int playernumber
      The player number the client plays with.
      private Server server
      The main server of this ClientHandler.
      private java.net.Socket socket
      The socket of this handler.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> supportedfeatures
      The list of features both the server and the client supports.

      • connectClient

        protected void connectClient(java.lang.String message)
        Connects a client and confirms it with the connectionMade() method. Gets the name from the client's message. Also gets the features and compares them with the features of the server. Remembers if there are corresponding features.
        Parameters:
        message - The CONNECT message received from the Client

      • connectionMade

        protected void connectionMade()
        Confirms the connection made. Sends also the supported features.

      • sendLobby

        protected void sendLobby()
        Sends the lobby to the Client.

      • sendError

        protected void sendError(java.lang.String header,
                         java.lang.String message)
        Sends an error to the Client.
        Parameters:
        header - header of the error
        message - error specification

      • sendInviteToOpp

        protected void sendInviteToOpp(java.lang.String message)
        Sends an invite from the client to the opponent.
        Parameters:
        message - The Invite message from the client

      • sendInvite

        protected void sendInvite(java.lang.String name,
                          int width,
                          int height)
        Sends an incoming invite (with board size) to the client.
        Parameters:
        name - opponent's name
        width - width of the board the opponent supports
        height - heigth of the board the opponent supports

      • sendInvite

        protected void sendInvite(java.lang.String name)
        Sends an incoming invite (without board size) to the client.
        Parameters:
        name - opponent's name

      • setupGame

        protected void setupGame(java.lang.String message)
        Sets up a game between two Client(handler)s. Fist skips the ACCEPT command from the client's message. Then makes a new GameHandler and assigns these to the two ClientHandlers. Also adds the Clienthandlers as observers to the Observable GameHandler. Then starts a new thread for the GameHandler.
        Parameters:
        message - the incoming ACCEPT message from the client.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        This update is getting called when the Observable (the GameHandler) calls a notifyObservers(). Gets an argument form the GameHandler, which is a correct move. Sends it through to the method moveOk(String arg).
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - The Observable
        arg - The argument which the Observable passes through.

      • setGameHandler

        protected void setGameHandler(GameHandler gamehandler)
        Assigns a GameHandler to this ClientHandler.
        Parameters:
        gamehandler - the gamehandler to be assigned

      • sendGameStart

        protected void sendGameStart(java.lang.String p1,
                             java.lang.String p2)
        Sends a Start Game message to the client.
        Parameters:
        p1 - the name of player 1
        p2 - the name of player 2

      • sendGameEnd

        protected void sendGameEnd(java.lang.String type,
                           java.lang.String winner)
        Sends a Game End message to the client.
        Parameters:
        type - type of game end
        winner - the winner of the game

      • requestMove

        protected void requestMove()
        Requests a move from the client.

      • checkMove

        protected void checkMove(java.lang.String message)
        Checks the move given by the client, if there exitst a GameHandler. If the move is a valid move, then passes it to the GameHandler. Otherwise requests another move.
        Parameters:
        message - move message sended by the client

      • moveOk

        protected void moveOk(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a confirmed move from the GameHandler to the Client.
        Parameters:
        message - the command for a confirmed move

      • printError

        protected void printError(java.lang.String message)
        Prints an error message to the server's view.
        Parameters:
        message - the error message given by the client

      • serverShutDown

        public void serverShutDown()
        Handles the shutdown of the server. If there exists a game, disconnects the client from it and sets the game to null. Closes the output and removes the client from the server's list.

      • clientShutDown

        public void clientShutDown()
        Handles the shutdown of a client. If there exists a game, disconnects the client from it and sets the game to null. Closes the output and removes the client from the server's list. Shows also a message that the client has disconnected.
